[vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_image=”387″ bg_position=”left top” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” full_height=”yes” bg_color=”#f0f0e6″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” top_padding=”2%” bottom_padding=”2%” color_overlay=”#000000″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”center”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-10-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

Legal Resources and Supports

[/vc_column_text]
[nectar_icon icon_family=”fontawesome” icon_style=”default” icon_color=”white” icon_padding=”20px” icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-chevron-down” icon_size=”24″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#f0f0e6″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” top_padding=”4%” bottom_padding=”4%” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” bottom_padding=”2″ text_align=”left” class=”blueframe bottomleftthick toprightthin”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-10-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]

LAWS is not a legal service organization and we are unfortunately unable to provide legal advice. If you are looking for legal help we have curated a series of helpful resources and supports to help you out.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#f0f0e6″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”4%” bottom_padding=”3%” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”right” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]

— Resources

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom”][nectar_horizontal_list_item columns=”3″ column_layout_using_3_columns=”large_first” col_1_text_align=”left” col_2_text_align=”left” col_3_text_align=”right” cta_1_open_new_tab=”true” font_family=”h4″ open_new_tab=”true” hover_color=”accent-color” col_1_content=”Justice for Children and Youth” col_2_content=”Legal services for young people under 18 and homeless youth under 25 in Ontario.” cta_1_text=”Visit Website” cta_1_url=”http://jfcy.org/en/” url=”http://jfcy.org/en/”][nectar_horizontal_list_item columns=”3″ column_layout_using_3_columns=”large_first” col_1_text_align=”left” col_2_text_align=”left” col_3_text_align=”right” cta_1_open_new_tab=”true” font_family=”h4″ open_new_tab=”true” hover_color=”accent-color” col_1_content=”Kids Help Phone” col_2_content=”Kids Help Phone is Canada’s only 24/7, national support service. We offer professional counselling, information and referrals and volunteer-led, text-based support to young people in both English and French.” cta_1_text=”Visit Website” cta_1_url=”https://kidshelpphone.ca/” url=”https://kidshelpphone.ca/”][nectar_horizontal_list_item columns=”3″ column_layout_using_3_columns=”large_first” col_1_text_align=”left” We help people with their legal problems who cannot afford a lawyer.” cta_1_text=”Visit Website” cta_1_url=”https://www.osgoode.yorku.ca/community-clinics/welcome-community-legal-aid-services-program-clasp/” url=”https://www.osgoode.yorku.ca/community-clinics/welcome-community-legal-aid-services-program-clasp/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” bg_color=”#00c0c3″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”6%” bottom_padding=”6%” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” width=”1/4″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]
